:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Advanced Wireless Voice Gateway}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.ubeeinteractive.com/products/cable/wireless-gateways/dvw32cb-advanced-wireless-voice-gateway}} Various Ubee Part Numbers may be used including: * DVW32C1B * DVW32C1 DOCSIS 3.0 16x4{{CableModemSpec |down_c=16 |up_c=4 }} *Compatible with {{Approved by service|Time Warner}} Cable. {{WiFiCert|WFA56793|12/03/2014}} ===See Also=== *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]]
